name: Wasteland Survival
description: Survive the post apocalypse in Wasteland Survival - the last shelter for survivors on earth! The first thing you need learn is survival. Build home. Craft & Upgrade weapons to kill hordes of zombies, Hunt & Explore with your dog. Gather resources and PVP Plunder... Can you stop the zombie apocalypse?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM or better DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
